TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Abstract base class for a serializer that can serialize and deserialize key identifier clauses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Key identifier clauses are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> class and by classes derived from it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClause(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed

Docs.param: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the element where the specified reader is positioned can be read as a key identifier clause by the handler.
Docs.returns: if the XML can be deserialized to a key identifier clause by the handler; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Checks whether the XML can be read as a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> of the <xref:System.Type> processed by the derived handler.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause securityKeyIdentifierClause) cil managed

Docs.param: The key identifier clause to check.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the specified key identifier clause can be serialized by the handler.
Docs.returns: if the key identifier clause can be serialized by the handler, otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause ReadKeyIdentifierClause(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed

Docs.param: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause to read.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes a key identifier clause from by using the specified XML reader.
Docs.returns: The key identifier clause that was deserialized from the XML.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void WriteKeyIdentifierClause (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause securityKeyIdentifierClause);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteKeyIdentifierClause(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause securityKeyIdentifierClause) cil managed

Docs.param: The XML Writer to use to serialized the key identifier clause.
The key identifier clause to serialize.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified key identifier clause.
